textBeforeTable: Latest Reviews Release Date: September 28, 2004 Crusader Kings focuses on the feudal kingdoms of medieval Europe from 1066 to 1453. In European locations that range from the Urals in the east to the coast of North Africa, you must achieve prestige and wealth for your dynasty while expanding its borders. You can also interact with feudal lords and bishops that rule various provinces. Crusader Kings gives you the chance to lead Christian monarchies, principalities, and empires to greatness.
